channel.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
channel.description:
Ok, in my server i have the ::pure command, but i would like to make it able to everybody to use it. How can i do so?.
Thanks.

item.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Zoft, post:5, topic:343948”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(13500000, 0); addSkillXP(13500000, 2); addSkillXP(13500000, 3); addSkillXP(13500000, 4); addSkillXP(13500000, 5); addSkillXP(13500000, 7); }
[/quote]Still wrong, change the 5 to a 6.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody

item.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(13500000, 0); addSkillXP(13500000, 2); addSkillXP(13500000, 3); addSkillXP(13500000, 4); addSkillXP(13500000, 5); addSkillXP(13500000, 7); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody

item.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote="`ZeroScape, post:3, topic:343948"] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { for (int Skill = 0; Skill < 20; Skill++) { addSkillXP(13500000, Skill); } }[/quote]Obviously you don’t understand what he means by ::pure, no defence no prayer.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody

item.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { for (int Skill = 0; Skill < 20; Skill++) { addSkillXP(13500000, Skill); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody

item.title: How to make the ::pure command able to everybody
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Make it so you don’t need rights 2 or higher to use it, make it 0.

Read full topic
